name: Swarm of Spirits
flavor: Guardian animal spirits surround you to harry your foes and bolster your allies.

metadata.flavor: Guardian animal spirits surround you to harry your foes and bolster your allies.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Until the end of your next turn, each ally in the area has each of their characteristic scores treated as 1 higher for the purpose of resisting potencies, and has a +1 bonus to saving throws.

effects.name: Persistent 1
effects.effect: You make the power roll again to target each enemy in the area without spending essence, and the effect lasts until the start of your next turn.
